items.question: Why was [Event] organized?
items.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?text ?url
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Background ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?background .
    ?background schema:citation ?url .
    ?background schema:description ?text .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}

rows.text: Live Aid was a dual-venue global benefit concert held on 13 July 1985, inspired by the Band Aid charity single “Do They Know It’s Christmas?” to raise funds for famine relief in Ethiopia. Conceived by Bob Geldof and Midge Ure, it was broadcast to nearly 2 billion viewers worldwide and became a landmark in humanitarian fundraising and popular culture.

rows_n3.text: "Live Aid was a dual-venue global benefit concert held on 13 July 1985, inspired by the Band Aid charity single “Do They Know It’s Christmas?” to raise funds for famine relief in Ethiopia. Conceived by Bob Geldof and Midge Ure, it was broadcast to nearly 2 billion viewers worldwide and became a landmark in humanitarian fundraising and popular culture."

items.executed_query:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?text ?url
WHERE {
    BIND (ex:LiveAid1985 AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Background ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?background .
    ?background schema:citation ?url .
    ?background schema:description ?text .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}
LIMIT 5

items.executed_query:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>

SELECT ?eventName ?text ?url
WHERE {
    BIND (ex:LiveAid1985 AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Background ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?background .
    ?background schema:citation ?url .
    ?background schema:description ?text .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}
LIMIT 5

items.question: How many satellites were used during [Event]’s broadcast?
items.sparql:
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
SELECT ?eventName ?satelliteNetworkDescription (SUM(?count) AS ?totalSatellites)
WHERE {
    BIND(  {event} AS ?event)
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
    ?broadcast a schema:BroadcastEvent ;
               schema:superEvent ?event ;
               ex:facilitatedBy ?satelliteNetwork .
    ?satelliteNetwork schema:hasPart ?fleet .
    ?satelliteNetwork schema:description ?satelliteNetworkDescription .
    ?fleet schema:numberOfItems ?count .
}
GROUP BY ?eventName ?broadcast ?satelliteNetworkDescription

rows.satelliteNetworkDescription: A network of commercial telecommunications satellites including five Intelsat satellites, which were integral to the global broadcast of the 1985 Live Aid concert.

rows_n3.satelliteNetworkDescription: "A network of commercial telecommunications satellites including five Intelsat satellites, which were integral to the global broadcast of the 1985 Live Aid concert."

items.executed_query:
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
SELECT ?eventName ?satelliteNetworkDescription (SUM(?count) AS ?totalSatellites)
WHERE {
    BIND(  ex:LiveAid1985 AS ?event)
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
    ?broadcast a schema:BroadcastEvent ;
               schema:superEvent ?event ;
               ex:facilitatedBy ?satelliteNetwork .
    ?satelliteNetwork schema:hasPart ?fleet .
    ?satelliteNetwork schema:description ?satelliteNetworkDescription .
    ?fleet schema:numberOfItems ?count .
}
GROUP BY ?eventName ?broadcast ?satelliteNetworkDescription
LIMIT 5

items.question: What was the attendance at each venue of [Event]?
Who founded [Event]?
items.sparql:
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
SELECT ?eventName ?founderName
WHERE {
    BIND(  {event} AS ?event)
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
    ?event schema:organizer ?founder .
    ?founder schema:name ?founderName .
}
items.executed_query:

items.question: Which [Artist] performed during [Event]?
items.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?url
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Performances ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?background .
    ?background schema:citation ?url .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}
items.executed_query:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?url
WHERE {
    BIND (ex:LiveAid1985 AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Performances ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?background .
    ?background schema:citation ?url .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}
LIMIT 5

items.question: Which [Song] did [Artist] perform at [Event]?
items.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
SELECT (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?workName; separator=", ") AS ?allWorkName)
WHERE {
    ?performance a mm:LivePerformance ;
                 schema:isPartOf ?event ;
    			 ex:isIconic ?isIconic .
    ?performance mm:performedWork ?work .
    ?performance schema:performer ?artist .
    ?work schema:name ?workName .
    FILTER(?event =   {event})
    FILTER(?artist = {musicgroup})
}

rows.allWorkName: Bohemian Rhapsody, Crazy Little Thing Called Love, Hammer to Fall, Radio Ga Ga, We Are the Champions, We Will Rock You

rows_n3.allWorkName: "Bohemian Rhapsody, Crazy Little Thing Called Love, Hammer to Fall, Radio Ga Ga, We Are the Champions, We Will Rock You"

items.executed_query:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX mm: <https://w3id.org/polifonia/ontology/music-meta/>
SELECT (GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT ?workName; separator=", ") AS ?allWorkName)
WHERE {
    ?performance a mm:LivePerformance ;
                 schema:isPartOf ?event ;
    			 ex:isIconic ?isIconic .
    ?performance mm:performedWork ?work .
    ?performance schema:performer ?artist .
    ?work schema:name ?workName .
    FILTER(?event =   ex:LiveAid1985)
    FILTER(?artist = ex:Queen)
}
LIMIT 5

items.question: What facilitated the simultaneous global broadcast of [Event]?
items.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?text ?url
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Satellite ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?satellite .
    ?satellite schema:citation ?url .
    ?satellite schema:description ?text .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}

rows.text: Details the satellite technology and coordination that enabled Live Aid's 1985 global broadcast.

items.question: What instruments were used in [Event]?
How much money was raised by [Event]?,
items.sparql:
PREFIX ex: <http://wembrewind.live/ex#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
PREFIX oa: <http://www.w3.org/ns/oa#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
SELECT ?eventName ?text ?url
WHERE {
    BIND ({event} AS ?event)
    ?annotation a oa:Annotation ;
           dct:subject ex:Fundraising ;
           oa:hasTarget ?event ;
           oa:hasBody ?fundraising .
    ?fundraising schema:citation ?url .
    ?fundraising schema:description ?text .
    ?event schema:name ?eventName .
}

rows.text: During the concert, Bob Geldof frequently encouraged donations—reportedly prompting a dramatic surge with heartfelt appeals like “give us your money!” (though he later said he’d never uttered the phrase), leading to a pace of roughly £300 in donations every second. By the end of the event, estimates place £150 million raised overall, with some reports indicating £40–50 million collected on the day, all aimed at alleviating the Ethiopian famine.

rows_n3.text: "During the concert, Bob Geldof frequently encouraged donations—reportedly prompting a dramatic surge with heartfelt appeals like “give us your money!” (though he later said he’d never uttered the phrase), leading to a pace of roughly £300 in donations every second. By the end of the event, estimates place £150 million raised overall, with some reports indicating £40–50 million collected on the day, all aimed at alleviating the Ethiopian famine."
